name: Searching for Verona
description:
Royal runaway bride Verona Adria Celeste vowed to never return to her broken home. But with a killer on the loose, and a sexy bounty hunter after her, she's forced to go back to the place she escaped two years ago. In a world filled with magic, mystery, and a whole lot of drama...What could possibly go wrong?

❥❥❥❥❥❥❥❥❥
Grab a chapter from my upcoming book ‘Searching For Verona’

Follow me in my journey as a self-published Author! 

Read more on my wattpad here:https://www.wattpad.com/story/267464102-searching-for-verona


This piece will come with an exclusive Airdrop from the Killjoyink.tez Genesis Collection :) 

Check out @killjoyartclub on Twitter for more information on the airdrop!
